title: ðŸš¨Jaguars hire Doug Pederson as head coach - Emergency Podcast (Football 2/4)
description:
DOUG (Pederson) is back in the NFL and will be coaching the Jacksonville Jaguars. Will Brinson is joined by noted Doug supporter, Deebo, to discuss the hire from all angles! Trent Baalke's presence looms large over the decision and could be cause of concern at the start of Pederson's tenure. What are the short-term and long-term expectations with Trevor Lawrence? How will the Jags handle the #1 overall pick? Who will Pederson target to fill out his coordinator vacancies? All that and more covered on this emergency episode!

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â 
You can listen to Pick Six on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast."
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @johnbreech, @E_DeBerardinis
